S:log-item.D:comment: DERBY-3836: On 10.4 branch JMX tests fail with security exceptions when run against classes - Backported (cleanly) revision 639721 from trunk: 'Add permissions to "class" portion of the derby test policy file that were added to the jar file section previously.'
